direction.raw_text: I don't know. (he yells o.s.) Hey Bill, which dress is better for you, the green or the red one? Cameraman Bill is standing at the camera.  He squints.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which one is the red one?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I mean I can't see the difference. I'm color-blind. (beat) But I like the dark gray one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : LATER The crew is shooting on a spooky castle foyer set.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Bela enters, wearing a lab coat costume.  As he slowly crosses, the old man rubs his hands fiendishly.  Ed YELLS live direction through a megaphone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, you're Dr. Eric Vornoff. You're upset. You've worked so hard on this experisent, and you don't want to see it fail. (Bela stops, to "emote") No, you're not that upset.  You want to keep moving.  You wanna cross the room. (Bela exits) Okay, CUT!  BEAUTIFUL!  PRINT IT! Ed claps his hands triumphantly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, let's go immediately to Scene 52.  Tor, are you in place?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, CUE RAINSTORM! Behind the window, Conrad pours a watering can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And roll camera!  ACTION! Tor enters, but can barely squeeze his bulk through the door. Finally he enters.  Ed YELLS through the segaphone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, you're Lobo.  You're upset. You've worked so hard helping Dr. Vornoff on this experiment, and you don't want to see it fail. (Tor stops, to "emote") No, you're not that upset.  You want to keep moving.  You wanna cross the room. (Tor exits) Okay, CUT!  PERFECT!  PRINT IT! OFF STAGE Bela talks to Tor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At Universal, they shot two scenes a day.  Eddie can knock off twenty or thirty!  He's incredible. BACK ON SET Cameraman Bill leans in to Ed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Ed, shouldn't we do another take? Big Baldy kinda got stuck in the doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it's fine.  It's real!  In actuality, Lobo would struggle with that problem every day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : LABORATORY SET - LATER They are back on the completed lab set.  Beyond the bunsen burners and beakers is a kitchenette in the corner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow, this lab looks great.  Except why is there a stove and refrigerator?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We couldn't afford any more props. If it seems weird, maybe you can add a scene where they eat dinner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nah, it'll work.  Where's Bela? Bela is asleep on a couch.  Ed nudges him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bela, are you ready?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mmph?  Where am I?

direction.raw_text: Out there ?! (he points at the water) What happened to the stream?

direction.raw_text: This'll look a lot better.  We have to match the stock footage of the octopus underwater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, for Christ's sake. Bela rolls up his pants and wades out, into the water.  He screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goddamn, it's cold!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Once you're in it, it warms up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck you! You come out here. (beat) Hey, toss me that J.D. A crew member throws Bela a bottle of Jack Daniels. Bela pops the cap and chugs half the bottle in one swig.  He licks his lips, then climbs onto the octopus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay!  How do we turn this thing on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bela, somebody misplaced the motor. So when you wrestle the octopus, shake the legs a bit, to make it look like it's killing you. Bela stares, deadpan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know I turned down "Frankenstein"?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After I did "Dracula," the studio offered me "Frankenstein"!  But I turned it down, the part wasn't sexy enough.  It was too degrading for a big star like me. The crew glances at Ed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bela, I've got twenty-five scenes to shoot tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't let me slow you down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright!  Let's put it on film.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !  SOUND! Bela takes another swig of J.D., then throws it off-camera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Bela starts flailing around the octopus legs and SCREAMING in horror.  This image is truly ridiculous. Ed is pleased. Some crew members nod: Pretty good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And CUT! Everybody cheers. Then suddenly the dam walls BURST. WHOOSH!  The water rushes from the lake and floods the park below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. DINKY SOUNDSTAGES - EARLY MORNING Crew members straggle in for the final shoot.  Everybody looks bleary-eyed from last night.  Ed stands cheerily at the entrance, greeting them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon!  Just one more day!  Just have some coffee, you'll feel better! Tony staggers up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Wood, I only got one hour of sleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah?  Well I got no sleep, and I feel great! Ed sees Bela slowly shuffling along. Ed runs over to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bela.  I just wanna thank you again for last night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's fine, Eddie.  All in the line of duty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  Seriously.  I want you to know how much I appreciate what you've done for me.  A great man like you shouldn't have to run around in freezing water at four in the morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, there aren't too many other fellas I'd do it for...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wrote something special for you. I got to thinking about all the sacrifices you've made... and so I wrote you a new final speech. Ed hands him the paper.  Bela starts reading it, as Ed watches anxiously.  Bela is very touched.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eddie, this is quite a scene.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know it's a lot to give you at the last second. Bela looks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These lines -- I'll have no problem remembering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. SOUNDSTAGE - DAY They are shooting.  Ed watches off-camera, as Bela acts a somber scene with an actor playing PROFESSOR STROWSKI, a threatening European.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Our government wants you to return... to continue your experiments there.  Where you can have everything at your disposal."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "My dear Professor Strowski, twenty years ago I was banned from my home land.  I was classed as a madman -- a charlatan -- outlawed in the world of science which previously honored me as a genius!" (he gets very subdued) "Now here in this forsaken jungle hell, I have proven that I am alright."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Yes, the authorities have learned how correct your findings were.  So I am here -- sent to bring you home."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Home.  I have no home.  Hunted... despised... living like an animal
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (he smiles, then pulls out a script page)
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: the jungle is my home!  But I will show the world that I can be its master.  I shall perfect my own race of people -- a race of atomic supermen that will conquer the world!" It's an incredible performance of crowning tragedy.  Bela is totally drained. CU - ED He is very moved.  He whispers, barely audible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cut.  It's a wrap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. MEAT PACKING PLANT - NIGHT The wrap party is being thrown in the meat packing plant. People laugh and shout and carry on.  Tor pours booze in the punch.  R&B MUSIC plays.  Old Man McCoy dances with Loretta. Bunny dances with a young stud.  Dolores stands by herself. Bela and Criswell are giggling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you sleep in coffins?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.  There is nothing more comfortable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't believe this! I sleep in coffins!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !  My father ran a mortuary -- it's an old habit! They CLINK beers. EXT. MEAT PACKING PLANT - SAME TIME Outside, Vampira and two GIRL FRIENDS walk up.  They peer at a tin sign.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "McCoy Meat Packing"?  Are you sure there's a party here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I got this invitation.  It's a "Bride Of The Atom" party, whatever that means. They open the large steel door, and INSIDE is the wild bash. INT. PARTY Across the room, Paul and Conrad chat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Glen Or Glenda," now that was a hell of a picture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, this new one's gonna be a hundred times better.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that possible? Dolores overhears this.  She stares in disbelief. AT THE TURNTABLE Someone changes the record.  Brassy STRIPPER MUSIC begins. A door opens, and Ed struts out, in full gaudy drag. Everybody turns.  They start WHISTLING and HOLLARING. Ed grins, and starts into a wacky bump-and-grind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go, baby, go! Bunny runs up and sticks a dollar bill between Ed's fake tits. People LAUGH hysterically. Dolores is appalled. Ed shimmies to the music, blowing kisses all around.  He sees Vampira and waves. Vampira's jaw drops in recognition.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't believe it.  It's him ! Ed sashays up to Bela and dances a few steps with him.  The music is building to a climax.  Ed hurries off to center stage -- and as the MUSIC ENDS, he does a final swing of his hips, then suddenly yanks out his teeth! This brings down the house.  Everyone STAMPS their feet and CLAPS crazily. ANGLE - DOLORES Everyone, except Dolores.  Suddenly, she explodes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You people are INSANE!  Take a look around -- you're all FREAKS! The room quiets.  Dolores has snapped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're wasting your lives making
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !  Nobody cares!  These movies are TERRIBLE! (beat) I can't take it any longer! The group is shocked.  Nobody speaks. Dolores runs out of the party. Ed just stands, dumbstruck.  Then he chases after her, in his high heels and dress. EXT. MEAT PACKING PLANT - SAME TIME Dolores runs across the parking lot, in tears.  Ed catches up with her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dolores, wait!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ed, it's over.  I need a normal life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you really mean those things you said..? Dolores stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm tired of living on the fringe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you used to say -- DOLORES Ed... I just stuck it out so you could finish your movie. (pause) Now that it's done, so am I. She turns and walks away.  Ed is crushed.  He stands motionless, in his dress, in the dark.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. ED'S NEW APARTMENT - DAY Ed's new home is a single apartment, still filled with moving boxes.  Half-eaten plates of food are scattered about.  Ed lies asleep in bed, unshaven, in the middle of the day. The phone RINGS.  Ed awakens and woozily answers it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ed, dit I wake you?  It's two in avternoon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I was just doin' a little work...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bullchit!  You been like dis too many days.  I want to cheer you up. EXT. TOR'S HOUSE - NIGHT Ed drives his Nash though a tract Valley neighborhood and reaches Tor's little house.  Ed gets out, still looking groggy. He walks up the tulip-lined path and rings the DOORBELL. Clanging SWEDISH CHIMES bong inside. The door flies open, and Tor appears, beaming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edvard, you come! Tor gives Ed a back-breaking hug. INT. TOR'S HOUSE - SAME TIME Ed steps in.  The house is filled with cuckoo clocks and little Swedish knick-knacks.  Tor gestures proudly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so happy you visit.  Meet my family!  Greta, Karl, and Connie! THREE COLOSSAL PEOPLE lumber out.  Tor has the largest family we've ever seen.  Not fat -- but big-boned .  GRETA is Tor's gigantic Swedish wife, and KARL and CONNIE are their two elephantine children.  They ADLIB greetings: "Hallo!" "Welcome!" "Is a pleasure!" Ed cannot believe what he's seeing. INT. DINING ROOM - NIGHT Everyone noisily eats dinner.  The table looks like a Smorgasbord.  Entire hams, turkeys, a full case of beer, incredible quantities are being shoveled in.  Tor empties a beer in one gulp, then opens another.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pass the meatballs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This strudel is delicious, Mama. Ed is stupefied.  He picks at a little dainty serving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!  You're not eatink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, I don't have much of an appetite lately.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The food will make you feel bedder. Look at me -- I'm da happiest guy I know! All the Johnsons CHUCKLE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd be happy too, if I had such a great family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry.  You just haven't met right woman yet. (beat) Oopsy.  That cabbage goes right through me. Tor stands and hurries from the room.  Ed awkwardly makes conversation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Greta, your husband is a terrific actor.  You should come down and visit the set.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, it's really no problem at all!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do not approve of what you do with my husband Tor.  He is not a monster. These horror pictures are humiliating. Ed has no response.  Suddenly -- CRASH!  There's a loud o.s. SLAM, falling porcelain, then Tor SHOUTS FURIOUSLY in Swedish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: !  GODDAMMIT! Earl and Connie begin giggling. Ed is totally baffled. Tor runs out, angrily holding a BROKEN TOILET SEAT.  It is split in two.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, it happened again! Ed is boggle-eyed.  This house is sadness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tor, I should be getting home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nonsense!  You must try our hot glug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : LATER It's very late.  Tor and Ed sit in the living room, drinking from a steaming pot of hot stilled wine.  They are smashed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My friend, you tink Greta is first woman I ever see?  No!  Many duds, before I find her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But I thought me and Dolores had something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget her!  Move on.  A good lookink boy like you as you can have any girl you wish. Tor finishes his glug, and then his eyes roll back into his head, and he falls off the couch.  He starts SNORING. Ed stares at Tor, then gets up.  Ed turns off the lights and goes home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. ED'S APARTMENT - LATE NIGHT Ed smokes a cigarette and watches TV. ON THE TV Vampira is doing her shtick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooo!  That was so scary, it gave me goosebumps. (someone QUACKS os.; she pretends to be angry) No, dummy!  I didn't say "goose," I said "goosebumps."  Ugh!  Well, be sure to join me next week, for
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ."  Until then... pleasant nightmares. Vampira blows a kiss, then disappears into the mist.  A USED CAR COMMERCIAL abruptly comes on. ON ED He stares at the TV, then picks up the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. TV STUDIOS - SAME TIME Vampira is walking off stage.  She removes her black wig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: God, we need some better jokes on this show. A PRODUCTION ASSISTANT carries over a phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vampira, you got a phone call.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At this hour? (she takes the phone) Hello?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vampira!  Hi, this is Ed Wood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ed Wood!  You came to my party.  I directed "Bride Of The Atom"!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.  Yeah.  You. Ed pauses, nervously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I was wondering if maybe sometime you'd like to go out, and maybe grab some dinner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You mean like a date?  I thought you were a fag.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ?!  No, uh, I'm just a transvestite.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Isn't that the same thing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, no!  I like girls.  So how 'bout Friday?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, you seem like a nice guy, Ed, but you're just not my type. (beat) But keep in touch.  Let me know when your movie opens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : CLOSEUP - ED Click.  The phone hangs up.  Poor Ed just stands there, forlorn. CUT TO: EXT. CITY STREET - DAY Ed shuffles down the street, Mr. Lonely Guy, feeling sorry for himself. He glances in a coffee shop, and sees a sweet young woman inside.  Her name is NORMA McCARTY.  She wears a bow in her hair, Mary Jane shoes, and a fuzzy white angora sweater. Ed's eyes widen. INT. COFFEE SHOP - SAME TIME Innocent Norma sits by herself, eating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me.  Is that angora? Norma looks up.  Standing over her is Ed, smiling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why... yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you think angora has a tactile sensuality lacking in all other clothing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I suppose.  It's very expensive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's made from specially-bred rabbits that live in the Himalayas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you, an angora wholesaler?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I work in pictures.  I'm a director-actor-writer-producer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ah, c'mon!  Nobody does all that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two people do.  Orson Welles and me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, you're a very attractive girl. Norma blushes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My goodness, you're embarrassing me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You shouldn't be embarrassed by the truth. (he smoothly sits down) Mind if I order some hotcakes...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. CRISWELL'S CADILLAC - NIGHT Criswell and Paul drive at night.  They're dressed-up.  SWING MUSIC plays on the radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So who's the surprise for?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I dunno.  Ed was real mysterious. All he'd say was it's a surprise party.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Isn't that like him! (beat) And isn't that like us -- that we show up anyway. They pull up to a GUARD GATE.  They're at a studio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me.  We're here for the Wood party.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They've rented Stage 12.  Drive straight back. INT. SOUNDSTAGE - NIGHT There is another rambunctious party in progress.  Crepe paper streamers hang down.  Bela approaches Tor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what are we doing here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nobody knows.  But there's a lotta booze. Suddenly Ed steps into the middle of the room.  He's extremely handsome in his tuxedo, and beaming happily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me!  Could everyone please quiet down? (the room quiets) First of all, I want to thank you, all my good friends, for being here tonight.  And second, if you're wondering what the big surprise is... well, TONIGHT I'M GETTING MARRIED!! The crowd is stunned. Many people DROP their glasses. Ed proudly pulls out Norma.  She's in a wedding gown.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everybody, this is Norma ! ON BELA AND TOR They're bewildered.  Bela WHISPERS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who the fuck is she??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I never heard of her. Ed walks over.  He hugs Bela.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And Bela, I want you to be the best man! Bela smiles -- trying to hide his total confusion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : LATER The wedding is in progress.  The crowd is seated.  A MINISTER performs the ceremony with Ed and Norma.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Norma, do you promise to love, honor, and cherish... IN THE CROWD Everybody is QUIETLY GOSSIPING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't even know he had a girlfriend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hear she's an actress who gave him money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nah, I heard she's his childhood sweetheart from Poughkeepsie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I predict it's Dolores in a mask. AT THE ALTAR The Minister is speaking to Ed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...in sickness and in health, till death do you part?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then I now pronounce you man and wife. Ed kisses Norma. The crowd doesn't applaud.  They're too baffled by this whole event.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : THE RECEPTION Everyone's drinking and dancing.  Ed proudly introduces Norma to his buddies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Norma, this is Bela -- Bela, this is Norma.  Norma, this is Tor -- Tor, this is Norma.  Norma, this is Paul Paul, this is Norma.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So how long have you known Eddie?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Since Tuesday. Criswell grabs Ed and pulls him aside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edward, are you sure you know what you're doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.  It seems a little crazy, but sometimes you just know .  She's perfect for me. Outside, a car HONKS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oop, that's our cue! (to Norma) Honey, we gotta go.  GOODBYE, EVERYBODY! Ed and Norma run out the door.  The crowd hurries after them. OUTSIDE Ed and Norma jump into his Nash.  It says "Just Married" and is festooned with dangling tin cans.  The car screeches away.  The cans RATTLE NOISILY, then slowly fade into the distance...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. MOTEL - NIGHT We're at a desert roadside motel, the San Bernardino Arms.  A "Vacancy" light flashes. INT. MOTEL ROOM - SAME TIME Ed excitedly carries Norma over the threshold.  He throws her onto the bed, and they start ardently making out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eddie, I'm just a small-town girl. I've never done this before.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, I'll teach you. He helps her remove her wedding dress.  She is very shy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be understanding.  I don't know anything. Ed removes his jacket, then gestures to his shirt.  Norma nervously starts unbuttoning it. Ed bites his lip in anticipation. Norma opens the shirt... and inside, Ed is wearing a bra ! Norma is horrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the heck is THIS?!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Honey, I have a little secret to share with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. MOTEL - SAME TIME There's a loud woman's SCREAM. Then the door slams open, and Norma runs hysterically out, clutching her dress about her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay away from me!  You're perverted! Ed runs out after her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, be compassionate.  I'm your husband!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No you're not!  This marriage was never consummated.  I'm getting an annulment!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. LOS ANGELES STREETS - LATE NIGHT Ed drives sadly through the streets, alone.  His car still says "Just Married," and the tin cans RATTLE behind him. CUT TO: EXT. BELA'S HOUSE - LATE NIGHT Ed's car pulls up.  Ed stumbles out, yanks off the tin cans, and throws them in someone's trash. Ed despondently approaches Bela's.  Inside, a light glows, and the dogs BARK. Ed is relieved.  Bela's awake.  He BANGS on the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bela, let me in!  Bela, it's Eddie. He keeps BANGING.  Finally the door opens -- and Bela stands there, shakily waving a gun !  Bela is doped up, glassy-eyed, and disturbingly haggard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you here??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit!  Bela, what's with the gun?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why aren't you on your honeymoon? Where's Myrna?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Norma.  She changed her mind.  She doesn't wanna marry me. (beat) Can you put down the gun? Bela weakly lowers the gun. INT. BELA'S Ed walks in, in a near-stupor.  Needles and drug paraphernalia are scattered about
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was thinking about killing myself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus Christ, what an evening. (he looks around) What happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eddie, I received a letter from the government.  They're cutting off my unemployment.  That's all I've got. Without it, I can't pay the rent...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you have any savings?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm obsolete.  I have nothing to live for.  Tonight, I should die. (distraught) And you should come with me. Frail Bela points the gun at Ed.  Ed is terrified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Buddy, I don't know if that's such a good idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It'll be wonderful.  We'll be at peace.  In the afterlife, you don't have to worry about finding work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bela, I'm on your side.  C'mon, give me the gun... (he cautiously steps forward) If you give me the gun, I'll make you a drink.  What are you drinking?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Formaldehyde. Ed stares in anguish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Straight up or on the rocks? Bela drops the gun.  He starts weeping. Ed walks over and hugs the shaking old man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, Eddie.  I'm so sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry.  Everything's gonna be all right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. HOSPITAL - STILL LATER THAT NIGHT Ed's car pulls up at the South Metropolitan State Hospital. It's a grim, unwelcoming edifice. Ed helps weak Bela from the car.  They look at each other, then Ed gingerly leads Bela in. INT. HOSPITAL - SAME TIME The lobby is clammy and dim.  Ed and Bela reach the desk.  A NURSE looks up, startled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My goodness, you gave me the willies. You look like that Dracula guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My name is Bela Lugosi.  I wish to commit myself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For what reason?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have been a drug addict for twenty years.  I need help... The nurse nods.  She takes Bela's arm and leads him away.  Bela glances at Ed, then steps through a wide door.  As it swings shut, we see a DOCTOR walk over and shake Bela's hand. Ed stares at the door, dazed by all that's happened.  He sits down in a chair, exhausted. Ed's eyes slowly close, and he falls asleep...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. HOSPITAL - MORNING Ed is still asleep, but now sunlight beats in. Ed stirs and wakes up.  He groggily looks around, and sitting across from him is a woman, knitting.  This is KATHY O'HARA, 26, solid, reflective, with a dry sense of humor.  Ed peers at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hello. (beat) You're sleeping in a tuxedo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got married last night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.  Congratulations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The marriage already ended.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.  My condolences. Ed watches her knit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you making?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Booties for my father.  He gets cold in this hospital.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long's he been here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is my thirteenth pair. Ed nods.  He spots the Doctor walk by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me. (he runs to the Doctor) Doctor?  I'm with Mr. Lugosi.  How is he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well... there's a lot of junk in his system for such an old man. Apparently, he was addicted to morphine, tried to kick it, and got re-addicted to methadone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will he be okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll do our best.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. HOSPITAL CORRIDOR - NIGHT We are outside Bela's room.  He can be glimpsed inside, strapped to the bed and SCREAMING in pain.  He is going through painful withdrawal and shakes horribly. DISSOLVE TO: INT. HOSPITAL LOBBY - ANOTHER DAY Ed strides into the hospital, wearing different clothes, and carrying a box of chocolates.  He waves at the nurse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Lillian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Ed.  Boy, he's got a lot of visitors today.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He does? Ed is puzzled.  He hurries back. INT. HOSPITAL CORRIDOR - DAY A crowd of NEWSPAPER REPORTERS and PHOTOGRAPHERS overflow Bela's room.  Ed is astonished.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's going on here?!  Excuse me! INT. HOSPITAL ROOM Decrepit Bela is propped up in his bed, as the mob of reporters throw questions at hit and SNAP shots: "Bela, how long have you been a junkie??" "Bela, look this way!" Ed angrily pushes through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everybody out!  This is a hospital! Get out of here. Ed forces them out, then SLAMS the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Isn't it wonderful?  After all these years, the press is showing an interest again in Bela Lugosi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bela, they're parasites!  They just want to exploit you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fine.  Let them!  There is no such thing as bad press.  A man from New York even said he's putting me on the front page!  First celebrity to ever check into rehab. (he smiles feebly) When I get out of here, I will be healthy.  Strong!  I will be primed for my comeback! Bela starts COUGHING heavily.  Ed stares sadly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. LOBBY - ANOTHER DAY Ed sits tensely in the lobby, holding vigil.  Kathy O'Hara walks by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, it's you again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, hi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You look beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am.  How's your father?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's better.  Thank you for asking. (pause) How's your friend?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not good... Kathy reaches in her purse and pulls out two black booties.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I made him some booties to cheer him up. (beat) They're black -- to match his cape. She smiles. Ed slowly smiles in response.  But this isn't his normal slick smile.  It's gentler.  Sincere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you maybe like to get a coffee..?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. HOSPITAL CORRIDOR - DAY Ed and the Doctor stand in a doorway, talking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We thought Mr. Lugosi was insured though the Screen Actors Guild.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Isn't he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  They say his eligibility ran out years ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look, he doesn't have any money... but I'll give you everything I've got.  I have a few hundred dollars. The Doctor shakes his head grimly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That won't even begin to cover it. He's going to have to leave. INT. BELA'S HOSPITAL ROOM - DAY Bela lies sleeping in bed, pasty and pale.  NEWSPAPER CLIPPINGS of his hospital stay are tacked up. Ed anxiously tiptoes in.  He quietly speaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bela, wake up. Bela stirs lethargically.  Ed puts on a fake smile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got some good news.  The doctor says you're all better.  You can come home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?  I don't feel so great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you look good.  And the tests came back fine. (a poignant pause) C'mon... Ed gingerly helps Bela up. EXT. HOSPITAL - DAY Bela slowly gets into Ed's car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eddie, I wanna make another picture. When are we gonna make another picture?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Soon, Bela... Soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. CAMERA RENTAL HOUSE - DAY Ed is desperately trying to cut a deal with the OLD MANAGER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, I just need it for one afternoon!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ed, if I cut a deal for you, I gotta cut one for everybody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is different!  It'll mean so much to me.  All I need is a camera and a tripod.  No lights, no sound. Nothin' fancy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that's it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And one roll of film. The old guy gives Ed a tough look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. BELA'S HOUSE - DAY Bela is dressed in his Sunday finest, standing in front of his little house.  He wears a cloak and a wide-brimmed hat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is so exciting.  Another production! WE WIDEN.  Out on the lawn... is just Ed.  With the camera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So Eddie, don't we need a sound crew?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, this is just the second unit. We'll do the main footage later.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.  So what is the scene about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh... you're a very important and respected man.  You're leaving your house... and you're in a hurry to a big social event. Bela nods.  He mulls this over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay.  But what if I'm not in too big a hurry?  What if I take a moment to slow down and savor the beauty of life?  To smell a flower?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's great.  Let's do a take. WIDE Bela goes in the front door.  Ed gets behind the camera, then turns it ON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, roll camera!  Rolling.  Scene One, Take One! (pause) And... ACTION! There's a moment.  And then Bela slowly steps outside, calm, dignified, walking with a cane.  He looks about -- and then something catches his eye.  He leans down and picks a flower. Bela smells the flower, then abruptly drops it.  He starts crying.  A pause, and then he composes himself.  The old man slowly shuffles out of frame. Ed peers emotionally from behind the camera.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And, cut...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eddie, how was I?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perfect. Bela is pleased.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good. (beat) Now what about my close up?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. HOLLYWOOD DUPLEX - DUSK Ed's Nash convertible pulls up outside a neat little duplex in a nice neighborhood.  Ed is dressed up for a date.  He checks his hair nervously in the mirror, revealing an anxious boyishness we've never seen before. Ed carries a bouquet of flowers to the front door.  He rings the bell.  Kathy opens the door.  She looks very pretty in a full skirt with a crinolin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, flowers!  I didn't know you were so traditional.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just picked them up on the way over...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're very nice. (she smiles sweetly) Let me get my coat. EXT. CARNIVAL - NIGHT Ed and Kathy are at a tattered traveling carnival.  Rattling steel rides and flashing lights spin about them.  They stroll through the crowds eating cotton candy.  Kathy wears one of Ed's flowers on her dress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So have you always lived in L.A.?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  I'm from back east.  You know, All-American small town... everybody knew everybody, I was a Boy Scout, my dad worked for the post office...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sounds like you lived in Grovers Corners. INT. SPOOK HOUSE - NIGHT Ed and Kathy ride through the old mechanical spook house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you find it boring?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nah, 'cause I had my comic books. And I read pulp magazines.  And I listened to the radio dramas... A wooden WITCH jumps out at them.  They ignore it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.  I loved those shows!  "Inner Sanctum"... "The Shadow" -- ED (getting excited) Yeah!  Don't forget "Mercury Theatre"... And then every Saturday, I'd go to the little movie theater down the street.  I even started ushering there. A creaky GHOST flies overhead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not gonna believe the first picture I ever saw.  Your friend's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Dracula." Ed freaks out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's INCREDIBLE!  That's the first picture I ever saw!! WIDE Mechanical BATS drop down and flap around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is incredible! (beat) You know, I had to sleep with the lights on for a week after seeing that movie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had to sleep with the lights on for a month. (he smiles) But I never missed a Lugosi picture after that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A few years ago, I actually saw him do "Dracula" live.  I thought he was much scarier in person. CLOSEUP - ED He starts at Kathy in wonder.  He is overcome. Their car SMASHES through the tin exit doors. EXT. SPOOK HOUSE - SAME TIME Ed and Kathy's little car comes to a stop.  He gets very serious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kathy, I'm about to tell you something I've never told any girl on a first date.  But I think it's important that you know. (beat) I like to wear women's clothes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like to wear women's clothes: Panties, brassieres, sweaters, pumps... it's just something I do. And I can't believe I'm telling you, but I really like you, and I don't want it getting in the way down the road. Kathy is amazed.  She contemplates all this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does this mean you don't like sex with girls?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! I love sex with girls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.  Okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay? Kathy slyly grins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Ed grins back.  A moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. ED'S HOUSE - DAY Ed is on the telephone.  We SPLIT-SCREEN with Vampira.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vampira!  Hi, it's Ed Wood.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ed, I told you, I don't wanna go out!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, don't worry, I moved on.  I was just calling to see if you want to attend the world premiere of my new film, "Bride Of The Monster."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't you just make one called "Bride Of The Atom"?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the same film.  But the distributor wanted a punchier title. C'mon!  It's gonna be a big event -- we're going all out!  Bela, Tor, and Cris are coming.  You'll have fun! Vampira rolls her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. NEIGHBORHOOD MOVIE THEATER - NIGHT Hundreds of KIDS and TEENAGERS enter a dilapidated second-run theater.  A banner says "'Bride Of The Monster' World Premiere! Celebrities In Person!" EXT. DARK CITY STREET - SAME TIME An antique limousine HEARSE drives down a dingy street. INT. HEARSE Ed drives.  Tor, ill Bela, Vampira, and Criswell are crammed in with him, along with bewildered Kathy. Everyone is dressed in gaudy "scary" outfits.  Tor wears his frightening WHITE CONTACT LENSES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My eyes are killink me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry.  We're almost there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eddie, where are we?  We passed that carwash twenty minutes ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I predict we're lost.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey!  You wanna watch the hands?? Bela sheepishly removes his hand from her thigh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Has anyone ever been to Downey? INT. MOVIE THEATER - SAME TIME The audience is so restless, they're practically rioting.  They CLAP AND CHANT angrily. A fat patronizing MANAGER steps on stage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Children, if you don't calm down, there won't be the entertainment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was supposed to start an hour ago! INT. HEARSE - SAME TIME Tempers are flaring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My eyes are burnink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey look!  There's the theater.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where?  I can't see nothink! EXT. THEATER - SAME TIME The hearse pulls up.  A FRANTIC USHER runs over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank God, you're here!  They're tearing the place apart! The gang awkwardly steps out of the hearse.  Tor gets out and blindly walks straight into a lamp post.  WHACK!  He yelps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ow. Bela moves slowly, very feeble.  Vampira smooths out her slinky black dress, then puts her arm around Bela to help him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon!  This way! INT. THEATER - SAME TIME Criswell points Tor in the right direction, and the group stumbles in.  Ed escorts excited Kathy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've never been to a premiere before. The Usher opens the auditorium doors. INSIDE It's PANDEMONIUM.  People are screaming and shouting.  Kids jump up and down, on top of the chairs. Bela, Tor, Vaspira, and Criswell are alarmed. The lights dim on and off.  Scratchy SPOOKY MUSIC blasts over the sound system.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wow.  Go knock 'em dead! Criswell pushes blind Tor towards the stage.  Tor sticks out his arms and scarily staggers down the aisle.  Criswell nervously follows.  Vampira escorts Bela. The crowd BOOS.  They pelt our gang with popcorn. Tor GROWLS like a monster.  Kids LAUGH and jeer. ON ED AND KATHY In back, Ed speaks in a frightening manner into a MICROPHONE:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooooo!  At the stroke of midnight, the witching hour, the ghouls arise from the dead ! DOWN THE AISLE Tor slips in some butter.  He tumbles and falls. A WOMAN'S VOICE cackles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the blind leading the blind! Tor staggers to his feet.  All disoriented, he starts walking the wrong direction and falls over a chair.  People HECKLE. Criswell quickly helps his up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dis is a nightmare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's show biz. Criswell pushes Tor in the right direction.  Some roughnecks knock down Criswell and snatch his wallet. A MEAN BOY jumps on his chair, ripping the stuffing out of the seat.  He throws the fibers in the air, and they float over Bela and Vampira.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think they're getting ready to burn this place down. A HIGH SCHOOL PUNK runs up and grabs Vampira's breasts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Vampira, how 'bout a little love?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fuck off! She impulsively swings her arm and SLAMS the kid. ON STAGE The Manager pleads to the mob.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Children, please!  Be calm! Somebody throws a bottle and HITS him in the head.  He goes down. WIDE The lights suddenly go off.  Some girls SCREAM. Ed's panicked.  He grabs Kathy and runs down to his friends.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon!  We're getting the hell out of here! Ed rounds up Bela, Tor, Criswell, and Vampira. The crowd BOOS louder.  Blind Tor is totally confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is happening?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're escaping! The group runs up the aisle and leaves.  As the doors close, "Bride Of The Monster" starts unspooling on the screen. EXT. THEATER - SAME TIME The gang frantically runs out, scared for their lives. They look over.  Some JUVENILE DELINQUENTS are stripping the hearse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're gonna die. The theater doors CRASH open.  The angry mob pours out. Ed spins wildly around... and sees a cab approaching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Kathy runs frenziedly into the street and throws herself at the cab.  It screeches to a halt. Everybody sprints over and jumps in.  The cab ROARS away. INT. CAB - SAME TIME All of them are breathing heavily.  They watch in the rear window as they drive away from the rampage. A nervous silence.  Until Bela speaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now that was a premiere. All of them LAUGH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. HOLLYWOOD BOULEVARD - DAY Bela and Ed stroll down the street, in high spirits.  Bela smokes a big fat cigar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Last night was quite a romp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you see that kid grab Vampira's tits?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I envied him. (he chuckles) Hell, I envied you too, having a girlfriend that would jump in front of a car like that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, she's really somethin'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know none of my wives would've. Ed laughs.  Bela puffs his cigar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eddie, I want to thank you.  These last few days have been a good time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just wish you coulda seen the movie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No problem.  I know it by heart... Bela stops walking.  And in a BOOMING, THEATRICAL VOICE, he suddenly launches into his impassioned, climactic speech from "Bride Of The Monster."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Home.  I have no home.  Hunted... despised... living like an animal
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: the jungle is my home!  But I will show the world that I can be its master.  I shall perfect my own race of people... a race of atomic supermen that will conquer the world!" Ed is touched. A few people around them APPLAUD. Bela's face lights up, proud.  An awed MIDWESTERN TOURIST hands him a pen and paper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Lugosi, could I have your autograph?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Certainly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boy, that was incredible.  You're just as good an actor as you always were. Bela puffs out his chest majestically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Better. (beat) I'm seventy-four, but I don't know it.  If the brain is young, then the spirit is still vigorous... like a young man. Bela turns and smiles wanly at Ed. Ed smiles back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. ED'S KITCHEN - NIGHT Ed and Kathy stand in his kitchen, making dinner.  She sticks her finger in a pot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: delicious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks.  It's actually the only thing I know how to make. (he motions) Hey, can you grab that strainer? She holds a strainer.  Ed pours the spaghetti over it. Suddenly the PHONE rings. Ed groans.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ugh! Always at the wrong time. (he ANSWERS the phone) Hello? He listens. And then, he gets a very somber expression.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh no... Ed HANGS UP the phone.  He looks pained.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bela died.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. FUNERAL HOME - DAY It's Bela's funeral. Ed sits crying in the front row, with Kathy at his side. All Bela's friends are there.  They're very subdued. THE CASKET Bela lies inside, made up in his full Dracula outfit.  His hair is died black, and he wears the famous cape. EXT. HOLY CROSS CEMETERY - DAY On a grassy hill, Bela is laid to rest.  The small crowd of mourners stands silhouetted against the dark gray clouds. The coffin is lowered into the ground.  Ed stands at the front, silently watching. AT A DISTANCE A few TABLOID PHOTOGRAPHERS snap pictures.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whose crazy idea was it to bury him in the cape?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I heard it was in the will.  It was how he wanted to be remembered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. SCREENING ROOM - DAY Ed is alone in a darkened screening room, depressed. Playing on the SCREEN is the last footage of Bela: Bela stumbles around in front of his house and smells the flower. Ed drinks out of a flask. The film runs out.  A VOICE comes over a loudspeaker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you want me to run it again? Ed silently nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. ED'S APARTMENT - NIGHT Ed's apartment has gone to hell.  Ed is in a robe, unshaven and clutching a bottle of whiskey.  Newspapers are everywhere. Bela's and Ed's dogs eat out of the trash. Kathy tries to straighten things up.  Ed stares listlessly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd seen him in a coffin so many times, I expected him to jump out...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ed, you've got to snap out of this. Bela's dead -- you're not !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I might as well be.  I made shitty movies that nobody wanted to see. (beat) I blew it.  All he wanted was a comeback... that last glory...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well you tried -- ED (angry) I was a fuckin' HACK!  I let people recut the movies, cast their relatives... (beat) I let Bela down...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : EXT. ED'S APARTMENT BUILDING - DAY A new Studebaker pulls up.  A bumper sticker says "JESUS SAVES" A man in a plain brown suit steps out.  This is J. EDWARD REYNOLDS, 50, Ed's santironious southern Christian landlord. Reynolds assertively bangs on Ed's front door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Wood?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hruphh...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Wood, this is Mr. Reynolds, your landlord.  Could you please open up? The door opens a crack.  Bleary Ed peers out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Wood, you have bounced your third and final rent check.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm real sorry.  My stockbroker must have transferred the wrong account... C'mon in, I'll write you another one. INT. APARTMENT - SAME TIME Ed motions Reynolds in.  Reynolds peers unsurely at the tornado inside.  Then he notices a framed one-sheet for "BRIDE OF THE MONSTER."  Reynolds admires it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hmm, so you're in the picture business?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You could say that -- REYNOLDS I'm interested in the picture business.  My associates and I wish to produce a series of uplifting religious films, on the Apostles. But unfortunately, we don't have enough money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Raising money is tough.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh!  Our church has the money for one film.  We just don't have it for all twelve... ANGLE - ED His eyes suddenly pop. The color comes back to his fact.  A plan is quickly boiling over inside Ed's head.  He starts feverishly pacing around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay -- you know what you do?  You produce a film in a commercially proven genre.  And after it's a hit, you take the profits from that , and make the twelve Apostles' movies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would that work?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Absolutely!  You see this script..? Ed randomly grabs a script off the messy floor, then glances down, to see which one he picked up.  It says "Graverobbers From Outer Space."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: "Graverobbers From Outer Space"! It's money in the bank .
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Graverobbers from what ??
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From outer space!  It's science- fiction. Very big with the kids! If you make this picture, you'll have enough money to finance a HUNDRED religious films! (beat) And pay my back rent from the profits. Reynolds scratches his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know... this is all a lot to absorb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a guaranteed blockbuster!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Um, I understand that this science friction is popular -- but don't the big hits always have big stars?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well we've GOT a big star! Bela Lugosi!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, but I've got the last footage he ever shot!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just, it doesn't look like very much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's plenty!  It's the acorn that will grow a great oak.  I'll just find a double to finish his scenes, and we'll release it as "Bela Lugosi's Final Film" A beat.  Reynolds stares, intrigued...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : INT. ED'S APARTMENT - LATER The place is cleaned-up.  Ed shouts excitedly into the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bunny!  We're making another film! Yeah -- I got the Baptist Church of Beverly Hills to put up the cash! Paul sticks his head in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ed, I got the Lugosi lookalikes outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great!  Bring 'em in!  Bunny, I gotta run. Ed hangs up. Paul leads in THREE.  They look nothing like Bela.  One is a HOMELESS BUM, one is a SHORT FAT MAN, and one is CHINESE. Ed inspects them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too tall... too short... (he glances at the Chinese guy) And this guy doesn't work at all.
direction.name: direction
